bioAsHtml: Greg is a recovering Scala developer, always looking for ways to make things more complicated than they need to be. After a stint deconstructing recursion, he’s on a Category Theory bender, where the only thing you can do is compose. He is currently proving that Dhall is more than a configuration language at Formation (which is hiring Scala engineers!).
